name: Coofee chaos
description:
Coffee chaos

Want some fresh Coffee? 

This game was made in two days for the MashUp Game Jam 2! 

The Theme was UNCONVENTIONAL MEANS.

I really enjoyed working on this project,  because it was challenging to fit a game in such a small timeframe. 

I hope you enjoy playing the game! 

Also, if it gets requested I can make a better version with more levels after the game jam. 

In case your interested in speedrunning the game, I made a timer, so you can see your time! (maybe write your times in the comments so that you can compare yourself)

Have fun !
